p: Given that studies on the medicinal properties of SBH are still limited with the majority being focused on common health problems (such as inflammation, cancer and microbial infection), this review outlines the studies that have utilized SBH and highlights the reported beneficial properties of SBH ( Table 1). The health benefits of SBH can be broadly classified as having antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-obesity, anticancer and antimicrobial properties.
